text: Ksenia Anatolyevna Sobchak (; born on November 5, 1981) is a Russian television presenter, actress and singer. Since 2004 she has been the presenter of the reality show House 2. She is the only child of politicians Anatoly Sobchak (1937-2000) and Lyudmila Narusova (b.1951). Sobchak tried to run against the country's longest-running president Vladimir Putin in 2018. == Personal life == Ksenia is married to Konstantin Bogomolov, Ksenia has a son from her first marriage, his name is Plato. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Russian entertainers Category:Russian singers Category:21st-century Russian singers
title: Ksenia Sobchak
